BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-MapFilter
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: Volume subcommands that create a new map from an existing map

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: Command :: volume add :: Volume data :: Add two or more maps
Command :: volume bin :: Volume data :: Average map values over bins to reduce map size
Command :: volume boxes :: Volume data :: Extract maps for boxes around selected atoms
Command :: volume copy :: Volume data :: Copy a map or a map subregion
Command :: volume cover :: Volume data :: Use symmetry to extend a map to cover a region
Command :: volume falloff :: Volume data :: Smooth map values where map falls to zero
Command :: volume flatten :: Volume data :: Flatten map gradients
Command :: volume flip :: Volume data :: Reverse axis directions
Command :: volume fourier :: Volume data :: Fourier transform a map
Command :: volume gaussian :: Volume data :: Convolve map with a Gaussian for smoothing
Command :: volume laplacian :: Volume data :: Laplace filter a map to enhance edges
Command :: volume localCorrelation :: Volume data :: Compute correlation between maps over a slid
Command :: volume maximum :: Volume data :: Maximum pointwise values of 2 or more maps
Command :: volume minimum :: Volume data :: Minimum pointwise values of 2 or more maps
Command :: volume median :: Volume data :: Median map value over a sliding window
Command :: volume morph :: Volume data :: Linearly interpolate maps
Command :: volume multiply :: Volume data :: Multiply maps pointwise
Command :: volume new :: Volume data :: Create a new map with zero values
Command :: volume octant :: Volume data :: Zero all but an octant of a map
Command :: volume ~octant :: Volume data :: Zero an octant of a map
Command :: volume permuteAxes :: Volume data :: Permute map axes
Command :: volume resample :: Volume data :: Resample a map on the grid of another map
Command :: volume ridges :: Volume data :: Filter to detect map ridges
Command :: volume scale :: Volume data :: Scale and shift map values
Command :: volume subtract :: Volume data :: Subtract maps pointwise
Command :: volume threshold :: Volume data :: Set map values below a threshold to zero
Command :: volume tile :: Volume data :: Create a single plane map by tiling planes of a map
Command :: volume unbend :: Volume data :: Unwarp a map along a curved rectangular tube
Command :: volume unroll :: Volume data :: Unroll a cylindrical shell to form a new map
Command :: volume zone :: Volume data :: Zero map values beyond a distance range from atoms
Command :: volume unzone :: Volume data :: Show full map with no surface masking
Command :: vop :: Volume data :: Synonym for volume command for backward compatibility with Chimera
